content.description: This route traverses the entire face. Sit start all the way right on a good starting flake work your way left using good side pulls jugs. When you hit the first crack climb a few feet of it then move down into the lowest crack and traverse to the arete.
content.protection: Spotter but you are only a foot off the ground most of the way.
content.location: On the Shipwreck Boulder, start from a sit on far right side and traverse to far left arete.

content.description: This route climbs a series of easy ledges up the middle of the face. Start standing with hands about chest high and make fun moves up the easy face. Have fun.
content.location: On the Shipwreck Boulder on the face that faces the cliff, on the very blunt arete with many good ledges on it.

content.description:
A long boulder full of cracks and traverses. One possible highball. 

  Many possible routes
